definitions.definition: A brief battle between small groups, usually part of a longer or larger battle or war .

examples: Three people were arrested after a skirmish in a bar.

definitions.definition: A type of outdoor military style game using paintball or similar weapons.

main_definition: ( military ) A brief battle between small groups, usually part of a longer or larger battle or war .
secondary_definitions: ( figuratively , by extension ) Any minor dispute .
A type of outdoor military style game using paintball or similar weapons.
